Besok, Fahira Idris Diperiksa soal Kasus Meme 'Joker' Anies Baswedan
07 Nov 2019, 21:19 by Samsudhuha Wildansyah
Jakarta - Polisi mengagendakan pemeriksaan terhadap anggota DPD RI Fahira Idris pada Jumat (8/11) besok. Fahira akan diklarifikasi mengenai laporannya soal meme 'joker' Gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan dengan terlapor Ade Armando.
"Rencana besok akan diklarifikasi pelapornya," kata Kabid Humas Polda Metro Jaya Kombes Pol Argo Yuwono di Polda Metro Jaya, Jakarta, Kamis (7/11/2019).
Pelapor yang dimaksud Argo adalah Fahira Idris. Sedangkan terlapor dalam kasus ini ialah Ade Armando.
"Rencana besok nanti akan kita tanyakan seperti apa ya yang dilaporkannya dan barang buktinya apa yang dibawa. Kita tunggu saja besok," ungkap Argo.
Diketahui, Fahira Idris melaporkan Ade Armando ke Polda Metro Jaya karena mem-posting meme berupa foto Gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan dengan riasan wajah tokoh fiksi Joker ke Facebook. Fahira merasa tersinggung karena foto Gubernur DKI Jakarta diedit dengan riasan Joker dan disebarkan di media sosial. Ada pula narasi-narasi yang mengandung ujaran kebencian dalam posting-an Ade Armando itu.
Fahira juga sempat meminta atensi khusus dalam kasus itu ke Kapolda Metro Jaya Irjen Gatot Eddy Pramono. Sementara itu, Ade Armando sendiri menanggapi santai laporan Fahira itu. Menurutnya, Anies harus diberi kritik.
"Anies Baswedan memang harus dikecam secara terbuka akibat anggaran Aibon dan bolpen yang tidak masuk di akal. Itu merupakan penghamburan yang rakyat yang luar biasa. Menurut saya, apa yang dilakukannya jahat," ucap Ade kepada wartawan, Jumat (1/11).

Tomorrow, Fahira Idris is questioned about the Anies Baswedan's Meme 'Joker' Case
Nov 7 2019, 21:19 by Samsudhuha Wildansyah
Jakarta - Police scheduled an examination of DPD RI member Fahira Idris on Friday (8/11) tomorrow. Fahira will be clarified regarding his report on DKI Jakarta Governor Anies Baswedan's meme 'joker' with the reported Ade Armando.
"The report's plan tomorrow will be clarified by the reporter," said Head of Metro Jaya Police Public Relations Commissioner Commissioner Argo Yuwono at the Metro Jaya Regional Police Headquarters, Jakarta, Thursday (11/07/2019).
The reporter referred to by Argo was Fahira Idris. While reported in this case is Ade Armando.
"We will ask tomorrow's plans as to what they report and what evidence they bring. Let's wait tomorrow," Argo said.
It is known, Fahira Idris reported Ade Armando to the Metro Jaya Regional Police for posting a meme in the form of a photo of DKI Jakarta Governor Anies Baswedan with makeup from the fictional character Joker to Facebook. Fahira was offended because the photo of the Governor of DKI Jakarta was edited with Joker makeup and distributed on social media. There are also narratives that contain hate speech in Ade Armando's post.
Fahira also had time to ask for special attention in the case to the Jakarta Police Chief Inspector General Gatot Eddy Pramono. Meanwhile, Ade Armando himself casually responded to Fahira's report. According to him, Anies must be criticized.
"Anies Baswedan must be openly criticized for the unreasonable budget of Aibon and pens. That is an extraordinary waste of people. In my opinion, what he did was evil," Ade told reporters on Friday (1/11).
